analysis.key_quote: Since WGS 84 is explicitly a non-political program necessary for global navigation, OPM-2025-0004-0001 needs to be amended to provide an exemption for all workers who may meet the definitions of Schedule F as described in the document.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential politicization of the WGS 84 program and emphasizes the need for protections for employees involved in this critical non-political work, indicating opposition to the proposed rule.
